lead_paragraph: New York's top court handed a victory to opponents of hydraulic fracturing for natural gas Monday by affirming the right of municipalities to ban the practice within their borders.

headline.main: New York Top Court OKs Local Gas-Drilling Bans
headline.print_headline: New York Top Court OKs Local Gas-Drilling Bans

snippet: New York's top court handed a victory to opponents of hydraulic fracturing for natural gas Monday by affirming the right of municipalities to ban the practice within their borders....
